channel.title: bbcnews TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from bbcnews

item.title: The BBC visited the so-called Shein village in Guangzhou, China, and found workers making clothes for the fast fashion giant were labouring for around 75 hours a week in contravention of the country's labour laws. Shein says it is committed to the welfare
